medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain awoke her from sleep this morning around 5:45. She describes it as a constant dull, deep pressure in the right upper quadrant. The only relief she experienced was from morphine. She had several episodes of non-bilious/non-bloody emesis earlier today and continues to have intermittent dry heaves. Duration of symptoms includes normal bowel movement this morning; continued passing flatus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: migraine, tobacco use, GERD, depression, irritable bowel syndrome, fatty liver, thrombocytopenia, right tympanic membrane perforation.
medical_history.family_history: Sister was a heroin abuser and died; daughter has OCD.
